PageWidgetPortable.Title: Evolução
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <AmCharstAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_V1_EVOLUCAO.DATASOURCE.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause> ( (@FILIAL IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL = @FILIAL) OR ( @FILIAL NOT IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FILIAIS) AND A.FILIAL <> @FILIAL))</CriteriaWhereClause> <ChartType>Column</ChartType> <ChartHeight>400</ChartHeight> <ChartDefinition></ChartDefinition> </AmCharstAttributes>
